sentence.Network_en: He was right, of course, to avoid the mayoralty trap.
sentence.Network_cn: 当然, 他躲开了市长这个圈套倒是正确的.

sentence.Network_en: Probably he will succeed to the mayoralty.
sentence.Network_cn: 可能他将接替市长的职位.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 【2010年5月7日】每天翻译一页《傲慢与偏见》（14） ... rise ： 提拔。 mayoralty ： 市长职位。 denominate ： 命名，称呼。.
蜗牛_新浪博客 ... Commendation 称赞 Mayoralty 市长的职位 Pique 生气，不高兴，呕气。.

list.abs: He succeeded to the mayoralty ., 他继任市长的职位.
2. 矿藏lord mayoralty 市场的职位marketing centre 贸易中心

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French mairalte, from maire (see mayor)

auth_sentence.content: But it is ridiculous to suggest that BBC London takes a view one way or the other about which politician holds the mayoralty.

auth_sentence.content: Still, toward the end of his mayoralty, one community after another seemed to turn on him.

auth_sentence.content: He's got Bloomberg Corp., the mayoralty, changing the laws to benefit himself.
